parameters.definition: Capacity of water transported by wide pipes per minute
Capacity of water transported by narrow pipes per minute
Maximum number of wide pipes as a fraction of narrow pipes
Minimum total units of water to be transported every minute
Minimum number of wide pipes to be used

description: The government is reworking the pipes to transport water to houses in the area. The water can be transported through wide pipes or narrow pipes. Wide pipes can transport \param{WidePipeCapacity} units of water per minute and narrow pipes can transport \param{NarrowPipeCapacity} units of water per minute. Due to logistics, the number of wide pipes can be at most \param{MaxWideToNarrowRatio} times the number of narrow pipes. If there needs to be at least \param{MinTotalWater} units of water transported every minute, and at least \param{MinWidePipes} wide pipes must be used, minimize the total number of pipes required.
